se doom √® il padre degli fps, half life √® quello degli fps come li conosciamo adesso, capolavoro; non puoi andare a sparare in giro come se non ci fosse un domani, devi avere una strategia (tranne nello zen, l√¨ spari a capocchia), il che non significa solo stare dietro un muro e sparare: l'I.A. dei nemici varia e ti costringe a muoverti e ad utilizzare tutto l'arsenale; la storia √® stupenda, il pacing della narrazione √® on point, sa quando deve e non deve prendersi seriamente; Freeman chaddone.
10/10

This game is a fun to play but won't be for everyone. 

The campaign is a decent size and can be finished under 4 hours but as you can see by my hours that certainly didn't happen. This game is the definition of unforgiving. I finished the game with probably 100 saves on medium difficulty which I don't recommend for the casual player. 

This game uses the Valve engine and has the same issues as the Valve engine. For one it causes motion sickness. Unfortunately I'm the unlucky few that is affected by this but with a couple of settings changed I barely noticed or had symptoms. Minimize window (biggest effect), Change fov to around 110, Turn of Bobbing!, and Unlock frame-rate which is locked at 100. You can find how to do this online.

As for the story. I think most of us are familiar with the Mc Gordan Freeman. He's a scientist that had to toughen up to save his ass. I have to reiterate that this game is hard. They're are so many annoying easy to die to enemies like Doom. But unlike Doom the game can be very strategic. 

This is a great copp if it's on sale and would be fun and hard if you download a graphics mod. Funfact the moto of the game is "RUN, THINK, SHOOT, LIVE" but it should be Run, think, shoot, die.
the game is amazing that i dont want to stop playing. the graphics are beautiful. the campaign is very fun. i think the money was very worth it trust me.

Esta no es la versi√≥n original de Half-life

S√© que muchos prefieren jugar esta versi√≥n en lugar de la source por motivos de nostalgia o esencia, pero me he llevado una ingrata sorpresa, esta no es la versi√≥n original de Half-life del 98, y no lo digo por lo de los nuevos modelos 3D, ya que esos se pueden cambiar y usar los originales, lo note desde el principio cuando no apareci√≥ la vieja intro de Valve.

Porque no la recomiendo? Porque el esta versi√≥n en particular est√° rota, no se como ha hecho Valve para a√±adir errores que no estaban en el juego original de pc, b√°sicamente hay scripts que no se ejecutan correctamente, faltan muchos sonidos, la inteligencia artificial hace lo que se le da la gana y tiene bugs que pueden no ser destructivos pero si molestos, por lo que en general esta no es la experiencia definitiva del primer Half-life. 

Recomiendo mas la version source, que aunque sea infame para algunos por "arruinar la esencia del original", no presenta ninguno de los errores que si presenta esta versi√≥n... o bien, pueden bajarse y jugar la versi√≥n original en internet.

English Review:

This is not the original version of Half-life

I know that many prefer to play this version instead of the source for reasons of nostalgia or essence, but I have been unpleasantly surprised, this is not the original version of Half-life from 98, and I do not say it for the new models 3D, since those can be changed and used the originals, I noticed from the beginning when the old Valve intro didn't appear.

Why don't I recommend it? Because this particular version is broken, I don't know how Valve has done to add errors that were not in the original pc game, basically there are scripts that do not execute correctly, many sounds are missing, artificial intelligence does what it is given It wins and has bugs that may not be destructive but annoying, so in general this is not the definitive experience of the first Half-life.

I highly recommend the source version, that although it is infamous for some for "ruining the essence of the original", it does not present any of the errors that this version presents ... or, you can download and play the original version on the internet.
Quite a nostalgic game to me.
pretty good game. got it for $10.

one of the best games there is.  legendary game - for good reason.  gimped badly in some areas especially the spider/crab thing.

Nothing, like any other, when it comes to visual storytelling. This game establishes a story, of an unremarkable individual. Who finds himself working in a government funded facility, one with questionable ethics. The man, Gordon Freeman. Gordon is ordered to volunteer on a groundbreaking scientific research mission. Unfortunately, the scientists are filled with pride, and they are too stubborn to take consideration of a possible catastrophic event. Despite their efforts of tuning their scientific equipment to safety status, unforeseeable consequences came. Extra-dimensional aliens manifested around the facility, caused by the infamous anti-mass spectrometer. Gordon lost the people he knew, his associates, co-workers, friends and family. In spite of all of this, Gordon is confident enough to maneuver through the ruins of the infamous facility, with the aid of the cutting edge HEV suit, and his impeccable intellect.

The game features an arsenal, with various guns and scientific tools. You use them against your enemies, or interact with patches of the environment.
Na minha opini√£o Half life √© o melhor jogo que Foi criado

Revolutionary FPS mixing gameplay, maps and storytelling perfectly. There are a ton of weapons to choose from and they are different from each other so you will be using them all. It may be a bit hard but the experience is worth the effort. Buy this one, not the SOURCE engine version.
[h1]9/10 - MASTERPIECE[/h1]

One of the basic pieces of furniture, a chair is a type of seat. Its primary features are two pieces of a durable material, attached as back and seat to one another at a 90¬∞ or slightly greater angle, with usually the four corners of the horizontal seat attached in turn to four legs‚Äîor other parts of the seat's underside attached to three legs or to a shaft about which a four-arm turnstile on rollers can turn‚Äîstrong enough to support the weight of a person who sits on the seat (usually wide and broad enough to hold the lower body from the buttocks almost to the knees) and leans against the vertical back (usually high and wide enough to support the back to the shoulder blades). The legs are typically high enough for the seated person's thighs and knees to form a 90¬∞ or lesser angle.[1][2] Used in a number of rooms in homes (e.g. in living rooms, dining rooms, and dens), in schools and offices (with desks), and in various other workplaces, chairs may be made of wood, metal, or synthetic materials, and either the seat alone or the entire chair may be padded or upholstered in various colors and fabrics.

Chairs vary in design. An armchair has armrests fixed to the seat;[3] a recliner is upholstered and under its seat is a mechanism that allows one to lower the chair's back and raise into place a fold-out footrest;[4] a rocking chair has legs fixed to two long curved slats; and a wheelchair has wheels fixed to an axis under the seat.[5]

Half-Life | 1998 | PC | Played for: 9h

Played this game back in 2003 and replayed in 2020.
For it's time the in-game storytelling, graphics and sound were stellar. It is still a pleasant experience for anyone who wants to know more about Half-Life lore. Gameplay is the same that gave birth to CS1.6, which speaks for itself.

Story: 9,5/10
Gameplay: 8,5/10
Graphics/Physics: 8/10
Music/Sound: 9/10
Overall: 8,7/10

un juego bastante bueno los unicos problemas que tiene son por la edad por ejemplo cuando gordon se mueve y tu pulsas la w el personaje corre pero cuando la sueltas resulta que esta 3 segundos o menos corriendo como por asi decirlo que se "resbala" y eso hace que te caigas varias veces en saltos complejos y si le sumamos el da√±o por caida se vuelve molesto pero ese para mi es el unico problema por la jugabilidad por el dise√±o hay otro bastante mas importante y es que en el juego tiene unas especie de cabinas de curacion pero el problema es que solo esta ese objeto curativo y te pasas el juego con 10 o menos de vida pero por lo demas esas son mis unicas quejas en general un buen juego 90\100
es uno de los mejores juego que e jugado lo recomiendo si te gusta los shoters y las buenas historias

This game is a classic, there is a reason that Half life is considered to be on of the best, if not the best, games that spawned on of the best, if not the best game franchises. Revolutionary for its time and it still holds up well to this day, being better than a number of bit title modern games coming out today. Anyone who wishes to call them self a gamer, should play Half life, its the first game in a consistently, exceptionally well made game series made for anyone of any skill level. Easy to pick up and rewardingly difficult to master.

El juego definitivo, uno de los mejores que pude jugar en mi vida, impecable historia, nivel normal de dificultad, varias horas de entretenimiento. El recuerdo clave de mi infancia. 10/10 - Voy a seguir esperando siempre HL3.
At first, I was running late, but when I ran into senpai and they told me everything would be okay, I was reassured. But then everything was not okay. This game is great.

My god, this is a good game, it's really old but the outdated graphics just add to the atmosphere and eerie feeling of making your way through this facility, so don't let that turn you off to it. I wasn't expecting to get so addicted to it at all.
